price: “Maze nyuma yayo haze umwaka abantu babone imvura nyinshi (beze byinshi) nuko benge (imitobe myinshi).”
arabic: ثُمَّ يَأۡتِي مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَامٞ فِيهِ يُغَاثُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَفِيهِ يَعۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma yatī min baʿdi dhālika ʿāmun fīhi yughāthu al-nāsu wafīhi yaʿṣirūna
